metadata.title: CVE-2013-1439 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The "faster LJPEG decoder" in libraw 0.13.x, 0.14.x, and 0.15.x before0.15.4 allows context-dependent attackers to cause a denial of service(NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted photo file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1439` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

darktable - 1.6.0-1
No subscription required

libraw-bin - 0.15.3-1ubuntu1
libraw16 - 0.15.3-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.0-1').
libraw package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.15.3-1ubuntu1').
